nosotros.title: We are a company legally incorporated in Paraguay, dedicated to the development and optimization of mining activity. We provide them with the tool of tokenization of certified lithium reserves, seeking to innovate and revolutionize the electromobility industry.
nosotros.title p1: By converting lithium reserves into digital tokens, we make it easier for the mining industry to finance its operations, contributing to the development of its comprehensive activity, and the transition towards a more sustainable future.
nosotros.p1: We are a legally established company in the Republic of Paraguay, dedicated to the development and optimization of mining activity, particularly lithium mining.
nosotros.p2: We contribute to the mining activity by providing the tool of tokenization (of its certified lithium reserves), aiming to innovate and revolutionize the global electromobility industry. By converting these certified lithium reserves into digital tokens, we facilitate the industry's financing. This contributes to the overall development of its activity and the transition towards a more sustainable future.
nosotros.p3: The Atómico3 token, under the symbol 'AT3', is designed to represent the tokenization of lithium reserves. The current issuance of AT3 is 100,000,000,000 tokens, each backed by certified lithium reserves in accordance with international NI 43-101 standards.
nosotros.p4: The blockchain contract backing this issuance is number: 0x22a79a08ddb74A9F1A4eBE5da75300Ad9f1AED76, ensuring the integrity and transparency of the underlying assets.
nosotros.p5: The company uses an innovative model of tokenization of real-world assets (RWA) to facilitate the integration of natural resources into the digital economy.
nosotros.p6: The brand and patent associated with this model are registered under the ownership of Atómico 3 SA's CEO-Founder, Lic. Pablo Rutigliano, with international class code number 9. All rights related to the brand and model are formally registered and are for the exclusive use of Atómico 3 S.A.
nosotros.p7: Thus, AT3 is set to develop its prices based on mining reserves, establishing a direct relationship between AT3 (Atómico3) and the price of Li₂CO₃ (battery-grade lithium carbonate). In conclusion, 1 AT3 will be equivalent to the price of 1 kilogram of lithium carbonate.
nosotros.p8: The collaboration between governments, businesses, and communities, along with clear and effective legal regulation, will be crucial to ensure the success of this transition towards a cleaner and fairer economy. We aim to transform the global lithium market by seeking to declare it a commodity.
nosotros.Propósito descripcion: Contribute to the development of mining activity in Latin America through the tokenization of mining assets, collaborating in being the financial tool for the development of mining.
nosotros.Visión descripcion: We want to revolutionize the way natural resources are managed and invested by applying advanced tokenization and blockchain technologies.
nosotros.Misión descripcion: Improve the efficiency and transparency of the lithium market, open new opportunities for investors and contribute to global economic development.

atomicInfo.p1: It is a token that represents the tokenization of mining assets, tied to an underlying asset, Lithium (backed by lithium reserves certified under NI 43-101 standards), that each Project holds.
atomicInfo.p2: This process of digitizing lithium reserves allows for their commercialization on blockchain platforms, democratizing access to investment in natural resources, offering transparency, security, and liquidity.
atomicInfo.p3: With its innovative approach, we have facilitated sustainable investment and economic development in lithium-rich regions, positioning it as a high-value digital asset in the global market.
atomicInfo.descripcion atomico p1: Atómico3 is a token that represents the tokenization of mining assets, backed by lithium reserves certified under ni 43-101 standards. This process digitizes lithium reserves, allowing them to be traded on blockchain platforms.
atomicInfo.descripcion atomico p2: Atómico3 democratizes access to investment in natural resources, offering transparency, security and liquidity. With its innovative approach, Atómico3 facilitates sustainable investment and economic development in lithium-rich regions, positioning it as a high-value digital asset in the global market.
atomicInfo.criptoactivo responsable descripcion: Our token is backed by real lithium, with a value that grows alongside the demand for clean energy.
atomicInfo.mercado objetivo descripcion: Global investors with vision. Citizens committed to sustainability.
atomicInfo.plataformas utilizadas descripcion: Blockchain, official social networks and passionate communities, holders and technology enthusiasts.

faq.¿Ya puedo hacer staking de los AT3 que a: Can I now do the staking of the AT3 that I purchased?
faq.Si puedo: Yes, I can. To do this I must click on the blue button that says 'staking' located at the top of the page. Then in the pop-up window, I will be asked to link my wallet (to be able to say from where my at3 will come from). There I will see a form that I must fill in with my personal data and a contact email, this will allow me to choose the AT3 I want to place and the possible terms (60 days, 180 and 240). Finally, a confirmation will appear to confirm that it has been completed correctly.

stakingView.staking p1: This consists of acquiring cryptocurrencies and keeping them locked in a virtual wallet, smart contract, or wallet with the purpose of receiving profits or rewards. It's very similar to having a savings account and earning interest on the deposited capital.
stakingView.staking p1.1: In this case, it means depositing your Atómico3 into a smart contract (staking contract 0xAAF3AC68Bf80d995d7793a401653713A05a67B08), keeping them there for the period you choose (60, 180, or 240 days), benefiting from the interest we can offer based on the selected term.
stakingView.staking p1.2: At the end of the chosen term, all your AT3 will be returned to your wallet along with the agreed interest (unless you choose to renew it for a new term).
stakingView.staking p1.3: Remember that for this, you need to connect your wallet. If you don't know how to do it, you can watch the tutorials below.
stakingView.¿Qué es el Staking? They will be returned to your wallet once the term is over (unless you choose to renew for a new term).

terms.Términos y condiciones de pago del token: AT3 Token Payment Terms and Conditions
terms.General descripcion: These AT3 Token Payment Terms and Conditions ('AT3 Token Terms') apply to the use of the AT3 token as your selected payment method for eligible Atómico3.io products and services in certain jurisdictions. Please read these AT3 Token Terms carefully. By using AT3 Token as your payment method, you acknowledge and agree to be bound by these AT3 Token Terms. These AT3 Token Terms apply in addition to the terms and conditions contained in the Order Agreement and the Product Purchase Agreement. In the event of a conflict between these AT3 Token Terms and the Order Agreement or Product Purchase Agreement regarding transactions with the AT3 Token, these AT3 Token Terms will apply. If you do not agree with any of the terms and conditions in these AT3 Token Terms, please do not select AT3 Token as your payment method. We reserve the right to change, suspend, remove, disable or impose restrictions or limits on our acceptance of the AT3 token as a payment method for our products and services at any time and without liability to you, in our sole discretion.
terms.El token AT3 como método de pago: AT3 Token as a Payment Method
terms.El token AT3 como método de pago p1: When prompted during the purchase process, we may, at our discretion, allow you to select AT3 Token as a payment method for the purchase of eligible products and services in certain jurisdictions, as detailed in our AT3 Token Payments FAQ at www.atomic3.io/support/token-at3, which we may update from time to time. We may require you to provide us with additional information to verify your identity when selecting the AT3 token as your payment method. To make a payment in AT3 token, you need a digital wallet that supports AT3 token transfers to external digital wallets, compatible hardware, and internet access.
terms.El token AT3 como método de pago p2: If you decide to make an eligible purchase with AT3 token, you must select AT3 token as your payment method when prompted. We will provide you with a digital wallet address ('AT3 Token Address') in alphanumeric form and in QR code. This is the payment location where you will need to send the AT3 token from your digital wallet. You can copy and paste or manually enter the alphanumeric code we provide you into the recipient field in your digital wallet software, or if your digital wallet software supports QR codes, scan the QR code we provide using your device to auto-fill the recipient field with the alphanumeric code.
terms.nota importante descripcion: It is your responsibility to confirm and verify that the alphanumeric code provided is identical to the alphanumeric code displayed in your digital wallet software by scanning the QR code or copying and pasting the alphanumeric code. We will not be responsible for any loss of AT3 token or other digital assets as a result of sending AT3 token to an incorrect wallet address or sending a digital asset other than AT3 token.
terms.Comisiones de la red del token AT3 descr: You are responsible for paying directly all network fees associated with the transaction (“Transaction Fees”), in addition to the AT3 Token Price. If your digital wallet software does not automatically generate an amount for Transaction Fees, you will need to calculate the amount necessary for the transaction to be processed on the AT3 token network. For more details on Transaction Fees, please see the AT3 Token FAQ at www.atomic3.io/support/token-at3. The Transaction Fee covers the cost of verifying AT3 token transactions. We have no control over the Transaction Fee and do not receive any part of it.
terms.Soporte de pago de tokens AT3 descripcio: The AT3 token is the only digital asset we accept as payment for our products at this time. You cannot make purchases with us using any other digital assets, including other cryptocurrency tokens. Our digital wallet for AT3 token is not configured to detect or receive digital assets other than the AT3 token.

MAKE SURE YOU DO NOT SEND DIGITAL ASSETS OTHER THAN THE AT3 TOKEN. IF YOU ATTEMPT TO SEND A DIGITAL ASSET TYPE OTHER THAN THE AT3 TOKEN, THAT DIGITAL ASSET MAY BE LOST OR IRRETRIEVABLY DESTROYED. WE WILL NOT BE RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY LOST OR DESTROYED DIGITAL ASSETS.
terms.Transacciones completadas una vez confir: Once an AT3 token transaction is sent to the network, it will be unconfirmed for a period of time (generally less than an hour, but up to a day or more) until the network reflects such transfer in a specified number of consecutive blocks in the AT3 token network. Such number will be determined by us at our discretion. We will consider your transaction pending until the AT3 token network reflects the transaction in the required number of consecutive blocks. We will send you an email communication once we have received your payment.
terms.Pagos insuficientes y excesivos p1: The price of the AT3 token can be volatile and subject to up and down movements. You are responsible for initiating an AT3 token payment for the exact amount indicated on the payment page within the AT3 Token Price Window. Each AT3 Token Price will expire after the AT3 Token Price Window. After the AT3 Token Price expires, you will need to request a new AT3 Token Price and AT3 Token Price Window on the payment page and you may need to restart the payment process.
terms.Pagos insuficientes y excesivos p2: Regarding order fees and/or deposits, if you transmit an amount other than the Price in AT3 Token, your order may fail, we may refund your order fee and/or deposit under these AT3 Token Terms, and you must resubmit payment in the correct amount in order for us to process your order.
terms.i: If you transfer less than the AT3 Token Price, we will retain your payment and apply it to the amount due, and you will be required to pay the outstanding balance.
terms.ii: If you transfer more than the AT3 Token Price, you will not be entitled to a refund of the excess amount.
terms.Los pagos con el Token AT3 son definitiv: Payments with AT3 Token are Final
Once you initiate an AT3 token transaction, the transaction cannot be reversed. This is inherent in the nature of the AT3 token network and is not a policy set by us.
YOU ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR VERIFYING THAT YOU HAVE ENTERED THE CORRECT AT3 TOKEN ADDRESS IN THE RECIPIENT FIELD AND THE CORRECT AT3 TOKEN PRICE IN THE AMOUNT FIELD IN YOUR DIGITAL WALLET SOFTWARE.
terms.Protocolos de la red Token AT3 descripci: We do not own or control the underlying software protocols that govern the operation of the AT3 token network. The AT3 token network protocols are open source and may be used, copied, modified and distributed by anyone. We are not responsible for the operation of the AT3 token network protocols. The AT3 token network protocols are subject to sudden changes in operating rules (e.g., forks), and such changes may materially affect the value, function and/or even the name of the AT3 token.

documento.intro: The protection of your information is important to us. This Privacy Policy applies to all activities that involve the processing of your information and aims to ensure transparency and control in the way we handle your information.

informacion punto 1.intro: This document contains the Privacy Policy (the 'Policy') that governs the relationship between ATÓMICO3 S.A. ('Atómico'), hereinafter 'The Companies' and, as appropriate, individually and separately, and the users ('User' or, in plural, 'Users'), whenever Users access or use one or more of the following platforms:
informacion punto 1.punto ii: the 'Atómico' mobile application, available for download on mobile devices where it is available ('App').
informacion punto 1.punto iii: the digital asset exchange platform provided through the website https:// ('Exchange').
informacion punto 1.conclusion: For simplicity, we will refer to the Website, the App, and the Exchange collectively as 'Platform'.

informacion punto 2.p1: To protect your information, Atómico complies with the regulations in force in the Argentine Republic, in particular, the rules and principles established by Law No. 25.326 (hereinafter, the 'Personal Data Protection Law'), its Regulatory Decree No. 1558/01, and other provisions that add to, modify, regulate, extend, complement, or eliminate them.
informacion punto 2.p2: Atómico is a registered Responsible Party for the database containing your Personal Information with the Public Information Access Agency of the Argentine Republic.
informacion punto 2.p3: Atómico also complies with all regulations of the Republic of Paraguay. It is registered with the Secretariat for the Prevention of Money or Property Laundering (SEPRELAD) of the Republic of Paraguay, fully aligned with compliance with Decree No. 2463/2024, which issued the update and modification of the annex related to the Action Plan of Decree No. 9012 dated March 22, 2023, to comply with the recommendations of the Latin American Financial Action Task Force (GAFILAT) in the context of the country's Fourth Round of Mutual Evaluations. This update and modification of the Action Plan was incorporated as part of the Paraguayan State Strategic Plan (PEEP), approved by Decree No. 11.200/2013.

p1.content: Below, we highlight key concepts to understand and keep in mind while reading our Policy:

p2.title: AAIP
p2.content: It is the Public Information Access Agency of the Argentine Republic.

p3.title: Affiliate
p3.content: With respect to any given person, it shall be understood as any other person who controls, is controlled by, or is under common control with such a person, whether directly or indirectly. For the purposes of this definition, the term 'control' means the power to direct the management and policies of such a person, whether through ownership of voting shares or the right to elect the majority of the board of directors, and the terms 'controlled' and 'controls' shall be construed accordingly.

p4.title: Database
p4.content: It is the organized set of Personal Information subject to treatment or processing, whether electronic or not, regardless of the mode of its formation, storage, organization, or access.

p5.title: Consent
p5.content: The prior, free, express, and informed manifestation by the Owner of the Personal Information to carry out the processing of their Personal Information, which must be in writing or in another way that can be equated depending on the circumstances.

p6.title: Responsible
p6.content: A natural or legal person, public or private, who owns a Database.

p7.title: Owner
p7.content: Any natural or legal person whose Personal Information is subject to the processing referred to in this Policy.

p8.title: Transfer
p8.content: The transfer of information occurs when the Responsible Party sends the information to a recipient located inside or outside the country from which it was sent.

p9.title: Treatment
p9.content: Systematic operations and procedures, whether electronic or not, that allow the collection, preservation, organization, storage, modification, association, evaluation, blocking, destruction, and generally the processing of Personal Information, as well as its transfer to third parties through communications, consultations, interconnections, or transfers.

informacion punto 4.p1: When the User uses an Atómico Service and/or the Platform, the User agrees that Atómico may collect and process certain information about the User, for example: The use of, or access to the Service may require the creation of a User account. To create a User account and communicate with Atómico, the Companies require the User to provide their first and last name, email address, gender, date of birth, and other identifying data, depending on their use of the Service, their phone number, address, nationality, tax ID (CUIT, CUIL), national ID or other documents that allow identification, banking information, images (photographs of themselves or copies of their identification documents) requested for the purpose of validating their identity, financial information such as income, assets, liabilities, credit history, the origin of funds for using the Service, and the purposes for which the obtained funds will be used through the Service (hereinafter collectively referred to as 'Personal Information'). Additionally, Atómico will require the creation of a password to access certain functions of the Service.
informacion punto 4.p2: The forms that Atómico requests the User to complete indicate which data are mandatory and which are optional. If the User does not provide the mandatory information, it may result in Atómico being unable to provide or continue providing the Service or access to the Platform.
informacion punto 4.p3: The User is responsible for informing any necessary modification, change, or update of their Personal Information and will be accountable for the consequences of not having timely and fully informed Atómico of any of these.
informacion punto 4.p4: Atómico collects and processes general, statistical, and/or non-personally identifiable information ('Non-Personally Identifiable Information' or 'NPII') which includes technical information about your device, the operating system you use, and the application software.
informacion punto 4.p5: Additionally, Atómico collects and processes information regarding all operations and activities carried out through the Service, dates, duration and frequency of User sessions and access through any means to the Service, geographic location of the device through which the Service is accessed or used, configuration, IP address, browser information, transaction data, and any other information we are given access to through mobile devices, tablets, or computers with which the Service is accessed or used (hereinafter collectively referred to as 'Operational Information'). In the event of the transmission of Operational Information to third parties in accordance with the terms of this Policy, the holders of the Operational Information will not be identifiable, except in cases of transmission of Total Information, as defined in point 5 of this Policy.
informacion punto 4.p6: Atómico or its service providers may also use various web tools, including Cookies, Web Beacons, and Tagging on the Platform and advertisements, for the purpose of evaluating and improving the Platform and other electronic offerings, customizing services, enhancing your user experience, and communicating with Users about products and services that may be of interest.
informacion punto 4.p7: The User may choose to grant Atómico access to certain information stored by third parties, such as social networks (including but not limited to Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter). The type of information and the extent of its use may vary depending on the site or service and is controlled by your privacy settings on that site or service, and by your authorization when linking a third-party managed account to your Atómico managed account. Once you have linked your third-party managed account to your Service user account, you agree that Atómico may collect, store, and use, in accordance with this Policy, the information contained in the third-party managed account.
informacion punto 4.p8: Excluded from this Policy is information related to your health, race, ethnicity, sexual orientation, criminal background, religion, union membership, moral and political opinions, as we will never ask you to provide it.

informacion punto 5.p1: The User agrees that Atómico may process all the User's information mentioned in point 4 of this Policy (collectively, the Personal Information, the Non-Personally Identifiable Information, and the Operational Information, hereinafter the 'Total Information') for the following purposes:

finalidades.a: Communicate with the User, provide the Service, and fulfill contractual commitments;
finalidades.b: Validate your information, verify your identity, detect or prevent fraud, scams, and other crimes, comply with regulations and policies on money laundering prevention and counter-terrorism financing, manage and resolve any claims related to actual or alleged fraud, scams, and other crimes, investigate, evaluate, and adjudicate claims, complaints, and risks, and associate, link, complete, consult, link, tie, use, relate, gather, and join information related to your identity and digital reputation available in the digital environment, including messaging services and applications in any digital format, social content networks, mobile devices, and wearables, and generally, information related to your interaction on websites, applications, and content;
finalidades.c: Improve, optimize, and modify the Service or third-party services. In particular, it is clarified that the use of images and photographs for information validation is central to Atómico providing its Services to Users securely and preventing fraud, scams, and other crimes. Atómico may outsource this function to a specialized provider, and the provider may incorporate Personal Information (including images and photographs) into a broader database to improve and customize its services for Atómico and all its clients;
finalidades.d: Collect and analyze data trends, evaluate Service performance, conduct satisfaction surveys, facilitate the design, development, generation, and provision of software updates, product support, and other products and services for Users;
finalidades.e: Prepare advertising and/or marketing campaigns associated with any product and/or service;
finalidades.f: Evaluate, develop, offer, and provide goods and/or services to Users (you will not receive these offers and/or services if, under the first paragraph of point 8, you have opted not to receive them);
finalidades.g: Comply with the law, regulation, or orders from competent authorities, or for reasons of public safety, public health, and/or national defense, and to comply with regulatory reports, respond to a court order or competent authority's order.
finalidades.h: Offer advertising or marketing information about products and/or services from those third parties, access to events or promotions, market research, or other marketing activities (you will not receive this information if, under the first paragraph of point 8, you have opted not to receive it);

informacion punto 6.intro: To fulfill the purposes detailed above, the Total Information may be shared with:
informacion punto 6.item i: Affiliates of Atómico, partners, and/or business collaborators.
informacion punto 6.item ii: Atómico's service providers, including providers of technology services, networks, data transmission, identity verification, and other providers necessary for Atómico to provide all its Services correctly through the Platform.
informacion punto 6.item iii: National, provincial, or municipal public and regulatory authorities and bodies.
informacion punto 6.item iv: Atómico's and/or its affiliates' marketing service providers for analyzing User activities and optimizing advertising campaigns for Atómico, its affiliates, or Service Providers, in which case the processed information may be: IP address; MAC addresses; device ID and advertising IDs; HTTP header that includes the SDK processor version, country, language, device configuration, operating system version, as well as the app version; User's device and web activity information; and applications and tokens.
informacion punto 6.item v: Atómico's and/or its Affiliates' user experience (UX) service providers for analyzing the User's experience to improve the Platform, in which case the processed information may be: visited screens, interaction patterns (such as screen actions, gestures: taps, scrolls) and device details (type, version, model, operating system). We use the information collected by UXCam Inc. to improve our app.
informacion punto 6.item vi: Atómico's and/or its Affiliates' digital asset sending and receiving network service providers, such as Lightspark Group, Inc., including end-users of those providers, to enable the service of sending and receiving digital assets through those networks, in which case the processed information may be: the User's name and the user's address on that network. You agree that other users on that network may access your username and address on that network.
informacion punto 6.p2: You may revoke your consent for the transmission of your Personal Information to third parties at any time by contacting us in person or via email at the addresses specified at the bottom of this Policy. Depending on its scope, revoking your consent may result in us no longer being able to provide the Service.
informacion punto 6.p3: Any of the entities mentioned in the previous sections may be located in Paraguay, Argentina, Chile, Bolivia, Mexico, or even in countries on another continent or international or supranational organizations that, under applicable law, do not provide adequate personal data protection levels, such as Brazil or the United States, among others.
informacion punto 6.p4: As a result, by accepting this Policy, the User expressly consents to their Total Information, including their Personal Information, being transferred internationally by Atómico, even to countries or international or supranational organizations that do not provide adequate levels of personal data protection under applicable law.
informacion punto 6.actividades title: In accordance with the mentioned purposes, Atómico may carry out the following activities:
informacion punto 6.actividad 1: Know, store, and process all the information provided by you in one or more databases, in the format deemed most convenient.
informacion punto 6.actividad 2: Know, store, record, process, and monitor all information provided by you, either verbally or in writing, through any channel established by Atómico, which may be used as evidence in any complaint, claim, conciliation, or lawsuit.
informacion punto 6.actividad 3: Order, catalog, classify, divide, or separate the information provided by you.
informacion punto 6.actividad 4: Verify, corroborate, check, validate, monitor, investigate, or compare the information provided by you with any information legitimately available to us, including that known by our Affiliates.
informacion punto 6.actividad 5: Analyze, process, evaluate, treat, or compare the information provided by you or collected by Atómico through interaction on digital platforms related to Atómico. The resulting data from analysis, processing, evaluations, treatments, and comparisons will be subject to the same authorizations you granted.

informacion punto 7.intro: In compliance with the Personal Data Protection Law of the Republic of Argentina, and the Secretariat for the Prevention of Money Laundering or Assets, Atómico has taken appropriate measures to protect the security and confidentiality of your Personal Information, ensure that the provisions of this Policy are respected, and protect your Personal Information from loss, misuse, and unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction.
informacion punto 7.p1: To ensure an adequate level of security for your Personal Information, Atómico may take, among others, the following measures:
informacion punto 7.medida1: Encryption of Personal Information, when applicable.
informacion punto 7.medida2: Measures capable of ensuring confidentiality, integrity, availability, and treatment services.
informacion punto 7.medida3: Measures capable of quickly restoring the availability and access to Personal Information in the event of a physical or technical incident.
informacion punto 7.medida4: Regular verification, evaluation, and assessment processes of the effectiveness of technical and organizational measures.
informacion punto 7.medida5: Periodic risk assessment of accidental or unlawful destruction, loss, or alteration of Personal Information transferred, stored, or otherwise processed, or unauthorized communication or access to such information.
informacion punto 7.medida6: Measures to ensure that any person acting under Atómico's authority who has access to Personal Information can only process such information following Atómico's instructions.
informacion punto 7.confidencialidad: Your Personal Information will be treated confidentially. Within the scope of this Policy, we commit to maintaining confidentiality regarding such information and adopting all necessary measures to prevent its alteration, loss, unauthorized access, or processing, in accordance with applicable legislation and this Policy.

informacion punto 8.p1: You may select the types of information you do not wish to receive from us, including promotional or advertising information from Atómico, its Affiliates, or third parties. However, you may not prevent us from sending you non-promotional information, such as information about your User account or ongoing requests or claims, as long as you have a User account. The Service may transfer cookies to the storage unit of the device through which you access or use the Service. Cookies are alphanumeric identifiers that work with your web browser and allow our systems to recognize you and improve your use of the Service. You can delete cookies or prevent us from sending them.
informacion punto 8.p2: Check your browser's help section to perform any of these operations. In any case, we recommend allowing cookies from our Service: some features of the Service may not function properly or be completely disabled if cookies are disabled.
informacion punto 8.p3: You may also request the revocation of the geographic location monitoring of the devices through which you access the Service. However, this revocation could disable some features or directly prevent the provision of the Service.
informacion punto 8.p4: The Service may provide links to third-party websites. These websites are not operated by us and are beyond our control. Please note that these sites may collect information about you and that, by visiting them, you will be subject to their own privacy policies. Therefore, we recommend reading these and other documents governing your relationship with the providers of these websites. informacion punto 8.p5: This Policy applies only to the use of the Service, and not to other third-party applications or websites with which Atómico has connections or hyperlinks.

informacion punto 10.p1: Atómico takes all measures within its reach to protect the security, integrity, and confidentiality of Personal Information. However, the User assumes the risk of any transmission of any type of information under this Policy.
informacion punto 10.p2: The User will not initiate any claims against Atómico or its Affiliates, and will indemnify and hold Atómico, its Affiliates, and its officers, representatives, and employees harmless from and against any claim, demand, action, cost, expense (including court costs and reasonable attorney's fees), loss, damage, and/or harm, direct and/or indirect, judicial and/or extrajudicial, that may arise directly or indirectly from:

informacion punto 11.p1: The User may request, at any time, access, rectification, update, or deletion of their Personal Information. To do so, they must share the contact details listed below.
informacion punto 11.p2: If you contact Atómico, you must prove your identity so that Atómico can comply with access rights and proceed, as appropriate, with correction, updating, or deletion. Requests to delete Personal Information will be subject to any current legal and ethical obligations to inform or comply with document retention requirements imposed on us.
informacion punto 11.p3: Please note that email communications are not entirely secure, so you should not include sensitive data in the emails you send us.
informacion punto 11.p4: The User's Personal Information will be retained by Atómico for the duration of their Service subscription or as long as their User account is active. Upon cancellation or termination of the Service subscription, or closure of their User account, Personal Information will be kept until it is no longer necessary or relevant for the purposes for which it was collected by Atómico.
informacion punto 11.p5: Under no circumstances may the User revoke their consent and request the deletion of their Personal Information from Atómico when there is a legal or contractual obligation that requires Atómico to retain the Personal Information.
informacion punto 11.p6: We will not transfer your Personal Information to third parties without obtaining your prior consent, except when necessary to maintain our relationship with you, to continue providing the Service, or to comply with current data protection regulations. In particular, it is clarified that in the context of the provision of the Service, Atómico may transfer your Personal Information to Affiliates to carry out operations or activities associated with the Service. Therefore, by accepting this Policy, the User expressly consents to the transfer of their Personal Information to Atómico's Affiliates for operations or activities associated with the Service.
informacion punto 11.p7: As the holder of Personal Information, the User has the right to access such information free of charge at intervals of no less than six months, unless a legitimate interest is proven, in accordance with Article 14, paragraph 3 of the Personal Data Protection Law. The AAIP, the Regulatory Body for the Personal Data Protection Law, has the authority to address complaints and claims related to non-compliance with personal data protection regulations.

informacion punto 12.p1: This Policy is aligned with the laws of the Republic of Argentina in all respects and will be interpreted accordingly. It also seeks to comply with the regulations of the Republic of Paraguay, under the strict supervision of the Secretariat for the Prevention of Money Laundering or Assets.
informacion punto 12.p2: The AAIP, as the Regulatory Body for the Personal Data Protection Law, has the authority to address complaints and claims made by those whose rights have been affected by non-compliance with current personal data protection regulations.
informacion punto 12.p3: Without limiting the foregoing, in the event of any dispute, disagreement, or conflict arising from the application, interpretation, validity, and/or scope of this Policy, the User must communicate with Atómico in a reliable manner, submitting their claim so that the parties can attempt to reach an agreement. informacion punto 4.p1: The use of the Platform will pose risks due to (i) the fluctuation of the value of digital assets and (ii) the mere use of the internet or devices. Conversely, the fluctuation of digital assets presents an opportunity, and the use of the internet facilitates accessibility. Before using the Services, we recommend that you acquire knowledge and consult professionals or experts to advise you on the characteristics of digital assets and the technologies involved. We do not recommend using the Services if you have not adequately informed yourself.
informacion punto 4.p2: On the fluctuation of digital assets. In any case, you acknowledge and accept that digital assets and any activity related to them are financially risky in the sense that you may lose all the capital committed. Digital assets are highly volatile to the point that they could: have no value, depreciate to an insignificant value, or even cease to exist. The volatility of digital assets depends on issues beyond Atómico’s control. Therefore, Atómico does not guarantee that the capital committed in each operation performed on the Platform will maintain, increase, or reduce its value.
informacion punto 4.p3: We clarify that Atómico may provide you with information about digital assets and their prices, but you should never interpret that information as financial or investment advice, nor does it in any way represent any type of advice, recommendation, suggestion, offer, or proposal by Atómico or its Affiliates. Any purchase, sale, or other operation with digital assets is solely the User’s decision. Only you will be responsible for any loss of value of the digital assets you freely acquired.
informacion punto 4.p4: For the purposes of these T&C, Affiliates are considered any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by Atómico, or who, along with Atómico, are directly or indirectly under the common control of a third party. For the purposes of this definition, the word “control,” when used concerning Atómico, means the power to direct, directly or indirectly, the management and policies of Atómico through the ownership of voting shares or the right to elect a majority of the board members of such person, and the terms “that controls” and “controlled” have meanings correlating to the preceding.
informacion punto 4.p5: On the use of the internet or devices. informacion punto 4.p7: Atómico cannot guarantee that the Platform and communication channels with the User will always be free of viruses, spyware, trojans, worms, or any other element that may take knowledge of your information without your consent, damage or destroy your electronic devices, take control of your Account, or alter its normal functioning (“Harmful Elements”). Atómico will not be responsible for any damage the User may suffer as a result or in connection with Harmful Elements or phishing emails sent by third parties pretending to be Atómico.

informacion punto 7.p5: In accordance with the provisions of this clause, Atómico may reject a registration request or cancel, suspend, or prevent, temporarily or permanently, an Account, or access or use of the Platform or the Services by any User (i) in the event of inconsistencies or discrepancies in the information provided by a User, or unusual or suspicious activities of the User in relation to anti-money laundering and terrorism financing prevention or fraud; (ii) if the User fails to provide or update the required information or documentation in a timely manner; (iii) if the User is subject to Sanctions, or located in, established in, or is a resident of a country or territory subject to Sanctions, as provided in this clause; (iv) if the User is or may be related to criminal activities, as stipulated in this clause; (v) if Atómico identifies suspicious or illegal activities or those not permitted by the practices and good customs of the industry, or (vi) when Atómico believes that the User violates these T&C, in whole or in part. informacion punto 9.9.2.1: Generalities. Limits. informacion punto 9.9.2.5 p9: Commission for buying or selling digital assets: 2% final.

In case those terms and conditions contain any provision that contradicts these T&C, the User agrees that these T&C shall prevail.

informacion punto 9.9.4.1: Receipt or purchase of digital assets. The User agrees that the receipt of digital assets in their Account may occur through the issuance of purchase orders by the means available through the Platform or indicated on the Platform—which Atómico may modify without prior notice—or by receiving transfers of digital assets from third parties. By issuing a purchase order for digital assets, regardless of the payment method, the User acknowledges and agrees that they will be authorizing Atómico, with the User's available funds in their Account, to procure for the User the quantity and type of digital assets indicated, through any channels and in any lawful manner that Atómico deems appropriate. The User agrees that the quotation indicated by Atómico will only be maintained for the period established on the Platform.
informacion punto 9.9.4.2: Storage of digital assets. The User acknowledges and agrees that, in order to provide a better User experience and especially to minimize the consequences of potential attacks on the User or the Platform, the digital assets that the User sees on the Platform as their own may be associated with one or more Public Keys controlled by Atómico and/or its Affiliates instead of the User's Public Key. “Public Key” means the alphanumeric code used in the blockchain to identify a specific digital asset account. The User grants an irrevocable mandate to Atómico to safeguard the digital assets of their Account in one or more Public Keys controlled by Atómico and/or its Affiliates and/or third parties, and to use services and/or tools of its own or third parties so that Atómico can adequately provide the Services related to digital assets.
informacion punto 9.9.4.2 p1: Atómico and its Affiliates use a dual custody mechanism for digital assets, consisting of “cold and hot wallets” (the former are storage systems that do not need to be connected to the network, and the latter are storage systems connected to the network), so that the majority of the digital assets safeguarded from Users are stored by Atómico and/or its Affiliates in “cold wallets,” which are more secure “offline” systems. Therefore, the digital assets reflected in each User's balance on the Platform may be housed in Atómico and/or its Affiliates' “cold wallets.”
informacion punto 9.9.4.3: Sending and selling digital assets. The sale and sending of digital assets may be carried out through the means available on the Platform and in the manner indicated on the Platform. The sending or sale of digital assets will require the specified quantity and type of digital asset to exist in the Account, and in all cases will be subject to the payment of any debt the User may have with Atómico, regardless of its cause. The User agrees that the quotation provided by Atómico to the User will only be maintained for the period established on the Platform.
informacion punto 9.9.4.4: Delays. Cancellations. The User agrees that any type of operation with digital assets may be subject to delays or cancellations by third parties. The User acknowledges that Atómico will not be liable for direct or indirect damages that the delays and cancellations of third parties may cause. As far as Atómico is concerned, within its control, it will make reasonable efforts to ensure that all operations with digital assets are carried out within 72 business hours from when the Management Order is correctly submitted.
informacion punto 9.9.4.5: Returns. The User agrees that the existence of digital assets in their Account for any period of time will not make them eligible for returns of any kind unless Atómico expressly states otherwise for a specific product or Service.
informacion punto 9.9.4.6: Commissions. The User agrees that Atómico may charge them a commission for providing Services related to operations in digital assets, equivalent to a percentage of the amount of each operation, which will be charged upon the execution of each operation. The percentages are published on the Platform. It is expressly established that Atómico may modify the commission percentages and their payment method unilaterally at any time. Any change in the commission scheme will be published on the Platform and/or notified to Users through any of the available digital channels.
informacion punto 9.9.4.7: Exclusion of warranties and liability regarding blockchain technologies. Forks. Atómico has no authority or control over the blockchains or software protocols governing operations with digital assets enabled on the Platform. In general, these blockchains and protocols are open-source, and anyone can use, copy, modify, and distribute them. Consequently, Atómico assumes no responsibility for the operation of such protocols nor guarantees their functionality, security, or availability. By using the Services, the User acknowledges and agrees that the blockchains and protocols are subject to sudden changes in their operational rules (as in the case of potential forks), which may materially and/or significantly affect the value, functionality, or denomination of the digital asset in question and create new digital assets.
informacion punto 9.9.4.7 p1: In the event of a Fork, Atómico may immediately suspend its operations temporarily, and if it deems necessary, may (a) configure or reconfigure its systems and/or (b) decide not to support (or cease to support) a protocol and/or the original digital asset and/or the alternative one, as long as the User has the opportunity to withdraw the original digital assets from the Platform. The User agrees that Atómico has no obligation to transfer or in any way credit the User with alternative digital assets arising from a Fork. The User agrees that Atómico assumes no obligation or liability regarding a Fork, an unsupported branch of a blockchain, or an alternative protocol to an existing one. Furthermore, the User acknowledges and agrees that transactions made on the Blockchain are irreversible once confirmed through the protocol established in each case and that Atómico has no ability to reverse them.
informacion punto 9.9.4.8: User Responsibility. The User is responsible for complying with all regulations, measures, regulations, and/or communications regarding access to the foreign exchange market and complementary measures issued by the Central Bank of the Argentine Republic or any competent body, without prejudice to those that are exclusively for compliance by the Company.
informacion punto 9.9.4.9: Automatic Conversion. Upon accepting these T&Cs, the User will have the option to choose whether, when depositing guaraníes into their Account, to keep that balance in that currency or to carry out an automatic conversion of guaraníes (the “Automatic Conversion”) to the stable digital assets USDT or USDC (“USDT”) or any other digital asset that Atómico makes available for that purpose.
informacion punto 9.9.4.9.1: Irrevocable Mandate. If opting for Automatic Conversion, the User grants a mandate to Atómico so that each time the User receives a deposit in Argentine pesos in their payment account managed by Atómico, on behalf of and for the User, it will immediately purchase USDT or another digital asset, according to what was previously chosen, corresponding to the purchase price that appears at that moment on the Platform. The USDT or the digital assets corresponding to what was chosen in the Automatic Conversion will be credited to the Account.
informacion punto 9.9.4.9.2: Option. At any time, the User may modify their choice to carry out the Automatic Conversion to another of the available assets or to maintain the deposit in their payment account in Argentine pesos.
informacion punto 9.9.4.9.3: Sale. The User may, at any time, sell the USDT or another digital asset resulting from the Automatic Conversion on the Platform and at the sale price, published there at the appropriate time, against Argentine pesos. The Argentine pesos will be credited to their payment account, and the User may use them to contract other Services or to withdraw them.
informacion punto 9.9.4.9.4: The mentioned tokens are not a negotiable security, value title, or commodity, and you accept and acknowledge that you are receiving the token for use both on the Platform and on third-party exchanges where it may eventually be listed and not for investment or financial gain purposes. These Terms do not constitute any invitation to subscribe to negotiable securities, value titles, or any other instrument with similar effects.
informacion punto 9.9.4.10: In the event of a purchase with the ATOMICO3 Prepaid Card having selected one of the digital assets as a means of payment, the User grants an irrevocable mandate to Atómico to sell the necessary amount of the selected digital asset to obtain the corresponding Argentine pesos to cover the payment of the amount indicated by the Merchant. For this sale, Atómico will use the sale price of that asset at the time of the transaction. Atómico will charge the user the corresponding commission for a digital asset sale.
informacion punto 9.9.4.11: In the event of a transfer through the UENO BANK network in a currency different from AT3, the User agrees and grants an irrevocable mandate to Atómico to automatically convert the amount of the selected asset to its equivalent in AT3, according to the price on the Platform, at the time of the operation.

informacion punto 18.intro: Users of the Platform acknowledge and accept that Atómico may use tracking systems and similar technologies or that fulfill a similar function, such as those listed below non-exhaustively:
informacion punto 18.t1 p1: These are small files that can be installed in the storage site of the computer or device used by the User of the Platform, with a limited duration in time that help to customize the services. Additionally, Atómico may offer certain functionalities that are only available through the use of cookies.
informacion punto 18.t1 p2: Cookies are used to understand the interests, behavior, and demographics of those who visit or use the Platform and thus better understand their needs and interests and provide better service or related information. Atómico may also use the information obtained through cookies to analyze the pages navigated by the User or visitor, as well as their searches made, to improve and personalize business and promotional initiatives, conduct news, advertising, or promotions, interest banners, and enhance its content offerings; it may also use cookies to count and corroborate records and validation levels, as well as to promote and enforce the rules and security of the Platform.
informacion punto 18.t1 p3: Atómico may also add cookies to its emails to measure the effectiveness of its promotions and advertising campaigns. It is established that the installation, permanence, and existence of cookies on the User's or visitor's computer or device depend solely on their will and can be removed from their computer or device whenever they wish. To learn how to remove cookies from the system, it is necessary to review the settings of their browser.
informacion punto 18.t2 p1: Atómico may use an IP address logging system that allows knowing the location of Users to provide better service and related information, as well as to improve and personalize business and promotional initiatives, conduct news, advertising, or promotions, interest banners, refine its content offerings and articles, and, on the other hand, to promote and enforce the rules and security of Atómico. By accessing the Platform, the User acknowledges and accepts that such a system may be used.
informacion punto 18.t3 p1: This is an electronic image (also called a transparent pixel) placed in the code of a web page for purposes similar to cookies. Additionally, a single pixel is used to measure traffic patterns of Users to another to maximize traffic flow through the web. The User acknowledges and accepts that Atómico may use a tracking system through the use of single pixels.

informacion punto 19.p1: Atómico provides the ability for fully registered and validated Users at the required level to send ("Ordering User"), outside of the blockchain (off-chain), digital assets to other fully registered and validated Users at the required level ("Receiving User" or plural "Receiving Users"), at no cost (the "TAG Service").
informacion punto 19.p2: Users acknowledge and accept that transactions made through the TAG Service will not be recorded on the blockchain and can only be made between Users of the Platform in the Republic of Argentina.
informacion punto 19.p3: To use the TAG Service, Atómico will assign each User a unique alias that is only visible to that User, so the User can share it with another User to carry out a digital asset transfer.
informacion punto 19.p4: The Ordering User must first add the Receiving User to their list to whom they intend to make a transfer. The maximum limit of Receiving Users that can be added will be established in the corresponding section.
informacion punto 19.p5: The Ordering User can create a send instruction, specifying the exact amount of the digital asset they wish to send, and must select from the preloaded list the Receiving User to whom they wish to send the digital asset (the "TAG Instruction"). To create this TAG Instruction, the Ordering User must have a sufficient amount of the selected digital asset. When the Ordering User confirms the TAG Instruction, the amount of the selected digital asset will be earmarked for the execution of the TAG Instruction and cannot be used for any other purpose.
informacion punto 19.p6: The execution of the operation may take up to 48 (forty-eight) hours.
informacion punto 19.p7: Once the TAG Instruction is executed, Atómico will debit the amount of the digital asset sent from the Ordering User's account according to the TAG Instruction and credit it to the Receiving User's account.
informacion punto 19.p8: A TAG Instruction cannot be partially executed.
informacion punto 19.p9: Cancellation. In the case of initiated TAG Instructions, the Ordering User may only cancel them before they have been executed. Once the TAG Instruction has been executed, the Ordering User cannot change, revoke, or cancel it. If the Ordering User's Account does not have a sufficient amount of digital assets to execute a TAG Instruction, Atómico will cancel the TAG instruction.
informacion punto 19.p10: Fees. No fees will be charged for transactions made through the TAG Service. However, Atómico reserves the right to charge fees for the TAG Service, and in that case, these may, at Atómico's discretion, be updated at any time, with notification to the User through the communication channels established in these T&C. Updated fees will apply to any transaction that occurs after the effective date of those fees. You authorize Atómico to deduct any applicable fees from your account under these Terms.
informacion punto 19.p11: Limits. The daily, monthly, and annual limits for the number of transactions of the TAG Service will be established in the corresponding section of the Platform. Likewise, the minimum and maximum limits for the amount of digital assets in the TAG Service will be established in the corresponding section of the Platform.

informacion punto 20.20.1 p1: Atómico provides a digital asset exchange service within the Platform called Swap ("Swap").
informacion punto 20.20.1 p2: The User can order Atómico to execute a swap instruction of a specific amount of a digital asset or legal tender for another digital asset (the 'Swap Instruction'). Atómico will provide the User with the corresponding quote to execute the Swap Instruction for 15 (fifteen) seconds. To execute the Swap Instruction, the User must have (i) a sufficient amount of the specified digital asset and (ii) the amount for commissions or costs in the selected digital asset, if applicable to the Swap Instruction.
informacion punto 20.20.1 p3: For the Swap to be executed, the User must confirm the Swap Instruction, and once confirmed, the specified amount of the selected digital asset will be earmarked for the execution of the Swap Instruction and cannot be used for any other purpose.
informacion punto 20.20.1 p4: The Swap Instruction will only be executed for the amount specified by the User in the Swap Instruction. The execution of the Swap Instruction will take place immediately after the User's confirmation, unless there is an error or issue that is the User's responsibility.
informacion punto 20.20.1 p5: Once the Swap Instruction is executed, Atómico will debit the User's account the amount corresponding to the specified digital asset to be exchanged and will credit the amount of the chosen digital asset to be received. The transactions made will not be recorded on the blockchain.
informacion punto 20.20.2: Cancellation. The User cannot change, revoke, or cancel a Swap Instruction once confirmed. If their Account does not have a sufficient amount of digital assets to execute a Swap Instruction or to cover the corresponding commissions or expenses for the Swap Instruction, Atómico will not allow or will cancel the Swap Instruction.
informacion punto 20.20.3: Fees. The User agrees to pay Atómico the fees that are informed on the Platform. The fees may be updated at Atómico's discretion at any time, with notification to the User through the communication channels established in these T&C. Updated fees will apply to any transaction that occurs after the effective date of those fees. The User authorizes Atómico to deduct any applicable fees from the transaction under these Terms.
informacion punto 20.20.4: Limits. The Swap instruction will only be confirmed and executed if the amount specified by the User corresponds to the minimum and maximum limits established by Atómico and indicated on the Platform for executing Swaps.

informacion punto 21.21.1: Prepaid cards (the “Prepaid Card”, in plural “Prepaid Cards”) are offered on the Platform.
informacion punto 21.21.2: In the event that the holder of a Prepaid Card (“Cardholder”) makes purchases with their Prepaid Card using the digital asset AT3, they will receive in their Account an amount of digital asset AT3 equivalent to 2% (two percent) of the amount of that purchase. If purchases are made with the Card without the balance in guaraníes (used to cover the payment of the purchase) coming from the sale of digital assets, Atómico may apply a 'Reduced Cashback' of 0.5% (50/100 percent). The remaining conditions of the Cashback and the Reduced Cashback are identical, differing only in the percentage recognized by Atómico to the Cardholder. To determine the amount of cashback the Cardholder will receive for their purchase, Atómico will use the Buy quote of that digital asset in Argentine pesos in effect on the Platform at the time the purchase is made (the “Cashback”). Atómico will credit the Cashback to the Account within 48 (forty-eight) business hours from its production.
informacion punto 21.21.3: In the event that purchases abroad are enabled to be made with the Prepaid Card, if the consumption that originated the Cashback was made in a currency different from guaraní, VISA or MASTER will convert it to guaraní to determine the amount to be paid. This amount in Argentine pesos will be used to define the Cashback to be credited to the Cardholder, as stipulated in the previous paragraph.

proyectosTokenizacion.p1: In this section you will find information about lithium, and soon about Tokenization Projects
proyectosTokenizacion.p4: Lithium is a key element in modern technology and the transition towards sustainable energy, driving the demand for batteries for electronic devices and electric vehicles. Understanding its potential is essential to grasp market trends and investment opportunities.
proyectosTokenizacion.p4.1: It is a soft, silver-colored metal, extracted from minerals and salt flats, with unique properties that make it an irreplaceable resource in a wide variety of industrial applications.
proyectosTokenizacion.p4.2: With the exponential growth in demand for batteries for electronic devices and electric vehicles, understanding the role of lithium is essential for those who want to stay informed about market trends and investment opportunities.
proyectosTokenizacion.p5: Lithium has earned the designation of the 'white gold' of the 21st century due to its growing demand and essential role in the transition towards a sustainable energy model. This mineral is the foundation of lithium-ion batteries, an essential technology for electronic devices, electric vehicles, and renewable energy storage systems.
proyectosTokenizacion.p6: In a world moving towards reducing its dependence on fossil fuels, lithium emerges as an essential resource for efficiently storing and managing energy, allowing its use when needed.
proyectosTokenizacion.p7: In this context, backing our cryptocurrency with the value and reserves of lithium represents a unique investment opportunity. It not only allows our users to participate in the digital financial ecosystem, but it also links their investment to a strategic resource whose value will continue to increase as global demand for sustainable energy solutions grows. By acquiring this cryptocurrency, our users become part of an innovative and responsible vision, aligned with a more sustainable and technologically advanced future.
proyectosTokenizacion.p8: Explore the latest trends and developments in the world of lithium, and stay up to date with the most relevant updates that are shaping the future of this industry.
